attributes.title: App disappoints me🤢
attributes.review: So I downloaded the app so I could see what our president was up to. First the app didn’t gave me an option if I wanted the notification to notify me. Then it ask me for my number this is UNACCEPTABLE I don’t give out my number unless is anonymous. I was watching Netflix and out of no where the trump app  was spamming my phone I was so upset 😠I was trying to enjoy my movie night with my baby dady anonymous. So I decided to delete the app because it was getting me mad I almost ripped my mom favorite trump hat. Few hours later I heard a big noise as if there was an army of caillous then i saw caillous at my back and front door they knocked my door so loud that it woke my couch up so I opened the door because I’m not scared of nothing “debby Ryan face” then the caillous Kept on saying “if you don’t download the app again we will take you away” so I said NOO because you know I love a little action Tehe so they grab me then they threw me in a white van I was scared that I wasn’t going to see my baby dady anonymous anymore so I yelled my baby daddy is anonymous they stoped the car so fast that I almost turned into a pickle they asked me again who is your baby daddy I said anonymous they got so scared so they drove me back to my place and they left I didn’t even see because of how scared they were I never saw them again. And I am very disappointed on this app because I almost got killed so I’m giving the app a 1 Star review

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: This is the worst app ever. DON’T DOWNLOAD!!!! So first of all I was trying to see what’s happening with our crazy president so I got this app. All of a sudden this rats were crawling out of my phone saying vote trump. So I was like NOPE! So I went to go delete the app and it said yes❤️. Then again yes❤️. Then I realized the tiktok girls have come to save me!!! Then the tiktok girls saved me and we made a plan on are most wonderful tiktok gen z squad that should not be banned at ALL, that we should do something so we did something and we all went and threw trump out of tiktok land. Overall I have to give this app a one star I would give it a zero but yeah this app is a no no.

attributes.title: Constantly Crashing
attributes.review: The app keeps crashing at launch! It took 9 tries before getting it open. Didn’t take long after that for it to crash again. Could not log in or obtain any information. Needs some serious work.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: This app is unbelievable. I got it hoping to be able to play a game on it, but when I got to the app, all I got was this orange man saying racist, homophobic, and offensive things towards everyone who is not a straight, white male. And then I find out this man is our president??????

attributes.title: Take the L trump
attributes.review: Not that I really care about the app but I couldn’t get into it like it’s not working at ALL

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: If I could give this zero stars I would
